content:
@Esteban Küber something that's been on my mind which never got done: I'd like to revisit the borrow check error messages more holistically and try to review them for consistent use of terminology, as well as stylistically.

I wonder if you (or maybe some folks from @WG-compiler-nll) would be interested in scheduling an hour or two to do a video call on this topic. I feel like I need something to force me to do it :P
is this the long-awaited opportunity to start phasing in "loaning"? ;)
I'll be down for it. When would the people here have time for it?
A similar time to the current NLL meeting (adjusted with the clocks in Europe), on a different day.
(that's currently 19:30 UTC - before the clocks change this weekend)
Yes, so 20:00/20:30 UTC or so if it happens in the next couple of weeks
(Note: I still want to circle back to this, but it may have to wait a bit)
